content: Create a website with an impressive layout and an efficient user interface through standard HTML/CSS practices
Thoroughly document any requests for website add-ons and apps and initial brainstorming and reporting in any updates on site progress
Test your sites and application's appearance and functions on different browsers and environments
Maintaining software workflow management with a project management tool like GitHub and task runners like Grunt, Gulp, and Yarn
Design the architecture of an application's components and Fix bugs in existing projects
Cooperate with web designers to match the client's visual design intentions and Execute any design perfectly down to the last pixel
Testing new updates thoroughly to ensure they perform optimally and Running performance benchmarking tests
Production, modification, and maintenance of websites and web app user interfaces
Maintain beneficial site functions and update existing sites with the web development latest advancements
Tailoring the site's user experience for better ease of use and Conceptualizing initial web designs with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Creating tools that enhance how users see and interact with your site in any browser and Implementing responsive designs for mobile sites
Consultation on SEO best practices for your site and Testing the site during development for usability and fixing any bugs prior to launch
